naslov: SAMOBOR, KLADJE, PREDIVNA DRVENA KUĆA S BAZENOM, 165 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Samobor- Kladje, prekrasna drvena kuća idealna za odmor ili iznajmljivanje s predivnim pogledom . Kuća ima tri etaže. U prizemlju se nalazi: prostorija za okupljanje s natkrivenim izlazom na bazen ( vanjski tuševi uz bazen),  kupaona s tuš kabinom i wc-om, sauna te jacuzzi. Gornja etaža se sastoji od: ulaza, kupaona s wc-om i tuš kabinom, prostrana dnevna soba s kuhinjom te kaminom, izlazom na natkrivenu terasu. U potkrovlju se nalaze dvije spavaće sobe s wc-om , mogučnost još jedne sobe. Građena 2018. godine prema visokim standardima gradnje. Odlično organiziran prostor i vanjski sadržaj. Uz kuću se nalazi natkriveni roštilj. Predviđeno parkiranje 10 parkirnih mjesta. Ograda na daljnski, klimatizirano, video nadzor, voda cisterna (12 tisuća litara), postoji bunar u dvorištu (3 tisuće litara), septička jama. Za punjenje bazena dovoze vodu vatrogasci ( 30 tisuća litara). Voda je sva provedena u kući (2025. godine bi trebao doći gradski vodovod). Za sve dodatne informacije molim da mi se obratite na: Vlasta Boranić Licencirani agent za posredovanje nekretninama +385 91 157 1972 v.boranic@remax.hr RE/MAX City 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor Samobor-Kladje, a beautiful wooden house ideal for vacation or rental with a wonderful view. The house has three floors. On the ground floor there is: a meeting room with a covered access to the pool (outdoor showers next to the pool), a bathroom with a shower and toilet, a sauna and a jacuzzi. The upper floor consists of: entrance, bathroom with toilet and shower, spacious living room with kitchen and fireplace, exit to the covered terrace. In the attic there are two bedrooms with a toilet, the possibility of another room. Built in 2018 according to high construction standards. Excellently organized space and outdoor content. There is a covered barbecue next to the house. Planned parking 10 parking spaces. Remote fence, air conditioning, video surveillance, water tank (12 thousand liters), there is a well in the yard (3 thousand liters), septic tank. Firefighters bring water to fill the pool (30,000 liters). The water was all piped into the house (the city water supply should come in 2025). For any additional information, please contact me at: Vlasta Boranić Licensed real estate agent +385 91 157 1972 v.boranic@remax.hr RE/MAX City 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor
